00012 void TermVector::add(string t){
00013         map<string, int>::iterator it = termFreqMap.find(t);
00014         if(it != termFreqMap.end())
00015                 it->second ++ ;
00016         else
00017                 termFreqMap[t] = 1;
00018 }
00019 void TermVector::add(string t, int freq){
00020         map<string, int>::iterator it = termFreqMap.find(t);
00021         if(it != termFreqMap.end())
00022                 it->second += freq ;
00023         else
00024                 termFreqMap[t] = freq;
00025 }
